mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_table WHERE code = #{code} AND seq_id = #{seq_id}

SELECT p.user_id, p.seq_id, c.seq_id, c.comment_content, c.comment_regdate, c.user_id, c.code, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM comment_table c LEFT JOIN product_qna_table p ON p.seq_id = c.seq_id where p.seq_id = #{seq_id} and c.code = #{code} ORDER BY c.comment_regdate DESC
